https://t.co/8vOTNBp7t2  @irishexaminer The design contract for the M20 was finally awarded earlier this year and we have been assured by Fine Gael and Fianna Fáil that the project is going ahead, yet this morning we now hear that it is up for negotiation? @labour

@smytho We knew that months ago Ossian.  Saying this now is not new information.  What we would love to know is whether all prospective Government parties are committed to this project.  That would be helpful. Thank you.

Does this mean that the Devil in the Detailing of the PFG is that the timetable has slipped for delivery.  We have a budget line.  We have a route corridor.  The tyres are being kicked on the rail/ public transport options (Public Spending Code). What’s the story folks? https://t.co/CiwB7WYvOq
